NAME.Nominative: Friday of the Third Week of Lent
NAME.Short: Friday of the Third Week of Lent

TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 8<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: Through the power of Thy word Thou hast perfected all things, O God, and from nonbeing Thou hast brought us into being. Deliver us not up utterly because of our iniquities, O Sinless Lord, we pray.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: the righteous man shall be glad,
SEXTE.STICHOS: Do you indeed decree what is right?

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 7<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: O God, my helper art Thou
and Thy mercy shall go before me.
SEXTE.STICHOS: Rescue me from mine enemies, O God, and from them that rise up against me redeem me.
